body.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem 5.5” Michelangelo Deluxe Ninja Shouts Figure by Playmates Toys
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 6 hrs 38 mins
features: AUTHENTIC: Michelangelo stands 5.5” tall and comes authentically decorated and detailed just as he appears in the hit movie
SHOUT OUT: Pull back on his spring-loaded right arm or left leg to make him shout—spoken by the same talent who voices Mikey in the movie

HOLD ON: When you pull back Mikey's arm or leg and hold it, the word he’s saying is stretched and a syllable is repeated until you let go—then the word and phrase is completed and followed by a battle sound effect
LOTS TO SAY: Michelangelo figure includes nine phrases and four sound effects
COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect all the TMNT Mutant Mayhem action figures and accessories from Playmates Toys, your Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Toy Headquarters
body.description: Tap…tap… “Is this thing on?” Yes, it is! And with nine phrases and five sound effects—spoken in his authentic movie voice—you can hear what Ninja Shouts Michelangelo has to say! Mikey's the funny one of the group or at least he thinks so! (Sometimes his brothers are a tough crowd.) With some training from his rat-dad Splinter, Michelangelo and his brothers are finally ready to venture into the big city, where Mikey can test out his material. Nothing will come between him and his dream to be a stand-up comedian, but if you razz him, he might just razz you right back!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tap…tap… “Is this thing on?” Yes, it is! And with nine phrases and five sound effects—spoken in his authentic movie voice—you can hear what Ninja Shouts Michelangelo has to say! Mikey's the funny one of the group or at least he thinks so! (Sometimes his brothers are a tough crowd.) With some training from his rat-dad Splinter, Michelangelo and his brothers are finally ready to venture into the big city, where Mikey can test out his material. Nothing will come between him and his dream to be a stand-up comedian, but if you razz him, he might just razz you right back!

Tap…tap… “Is this thing on?” Yes, it is! And with nine phrases and five sound effects—spoken in his authentic movie voice—you can hear what Ninja Shouts Michelangelo has to say! Mikey's the funny one of the group or at least he thinks so! (Sometimes his brothers are a tough crowd.) With some training from his rat-dad Splinter, Michelangelo and his brothers are finally ready to venture into the big city, where Mikey can test out his material. Nothing will come between him and his dream to be a stand-up comedian, but if you razz him, he might just razz you right back!

SHOUT OUT: Pull back on his spring loaded right arm or left leg to make him shout—spoken by the same talent who voices Mikey in the movie LOTS TO SAY: Michelangelo figure includes nine phrases and four sound effects WEAPONS HOLSTERS: Mikey carries his twin nunchaku in the holsters on his back shell that are always ready for battle if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my nephew who loved TMNT and he was very happy! It's a really cool toy and it's presented well for a gift. I would recommend getting this for any TMNT lovers!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super quality and just what my grand child wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will always love the turtles but these Mutant Mayhem Turtles are noisy so just be warned. Other than that the size and quality are not bad. Dont know how durable they are yet, its only my sons 1st day with em !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My Grandson loves the Ninja Turtles and this brand is especially durable for a 4 year old little boy to play with and throw him and drop him ect.. very well made. Great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never too old for TMNT
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a cake topper for my 35 year old fiance's birthday cake. I didn't realize it talked until it arrived, so I just kept it in the box and gave it to him. He really loves it! Would definitely purchase the others to complete the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of these . Awesome sale price . My kid wants them all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper than the box stores and a good quality. Worth the price! Boys loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Makes random terrible noise
reviews.reviewText: This isn't the right size to go with any other TMNT toy set, it's way bigger than the others. Moving the arm makes it talk, so if it's just sitting there and gets bumped it makes loud noises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my grandsons birthday & he loved it. Definitely worth the money.

The media could not be loaded. So for turtle collectors its fun to add to the collection. Its a fun rendition but is a toy for sure. Has different phrases. Arms move on a spring. Nunchucks are fixed and don't move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality but no off switch
reviews.reviewText: Decent quality (not as good as I remember figures being In the 90’s though) the only down side there is no off switch which means the toys will continue to make sound if not carefully placed in the toy box.
